purpose: Télécom Paris is hiring a postdoctoral researcher for 30 months in the fields of software engineering and cybersecurity. The position is part of the SECUBIC project, which aims to improve the security of binary executables that include open source components. Interested candidates can find the complete job description and application details in the provided links, with a deadline of 31 August 2025.
evidence_sentences: Télécom Paris, engineering school member of the Polytechnic Institute of Paris, is hiring a postdoctoral researcher, for 30 months in the field(s) of software engineering and cybersecurity.

Télécom Paris is participating in the research project SECUBIC (SEcure BInary supply Chain, https://secubic-ptcc.github.io/) to improve the security of binary executables that include open source components.
For a complete job description see: - EN: https://institutminestelecom.recruitee.com/l/en/o/post-doctorante-ou-post-doctorant-en-genie-logiciel-et-cybersecurite-cdd-de-30-mois-2-5
